reviews.review: Mejor juego de todo el mundo es lo mejor que me paso en la Vida!!!!!!!!

I've been playing CS:GO since it came out (this is my second account as I have lost access to my other account) and all honestly the game right now is full of hackers, griefers and cheaters. Valve really doesn't seem to care about it since their new "approach" to cheaters really doesn't work at all. I used to play 4-5 matches in a day and at least in 2 matches there would be a hacker either on our team or on the opposing one. Been a fine cancerous ride with CS and I'm finally uninstalling this game for good
What's to say, it's still got it!
Зашёл, сгорел, пососал, вышел и так по кругу миллион раз. 10/10 рассадников даунов

Edit:
It has been over one thousand hours since posting and oh the horrors ive seen.

Look how many hours I have. What else to say? I do have to say though, if you don't want to get flamed for anything under the sun or are very sensitive, don't play csgo. There are a lot of people that will say anything to you if they feel you aren't doing enough in  their mind. Other than that, a really good game, although it is almost unplayable without prime.
